name: Super Elemental Fighters
description:
Super Elemental Fighters was developed at the Game Jam Hagenberg 2015 in 36 hours. The topic was about "Your powers will not work on me".

SEF is a fighting game with 5 different characters (Viking, Archer, Knight, Amazon and Wizard) There are 3 different powerups/elements (Water, Fire and Nature) Use the right element to deal more damage or to be invincible against another Element.

The second playmode is the "Jumpmode" where you have to jump on the platforms and try not to fall down. This mode supports scoring and singleplayer. 2 Players can play with the keyboard. You can also Play with Gamepads. The Game supports up to 4 Players.
